column4: I just put a hard drive in a removable drive bay (while the computer was on), how do I access the drive? It should be hdd, but I can't mount or use fdisk...
there may not be hotplug support enabled for that type of device.
so how can i 'detect' it manually?
you can't.   you have to configure hotplug support for it.
can you help me with that?
I do it with an authorized_hosts file in the .ssh directory
the file is a bit misnamed, it actually specifies user@host combinations
you just add a line to the file
you need to have the key, of course
ok, so I generate the key on the remote host, and then copy it across and put it in the local authourised_hosts?
saves a lot of typing, plus you can now disable passwords and protect yourself from a password attack
